Continuing Professional Development for Teaching Assistants and others who support learning in schools at Leeds Trinity &

The recognition of the proper use of  teachers, teaching assistants, cover supervisors and Higher Level Teaching  Assistants is one of the most important challenges facing schools in the  immediate future.&nbsp

column2: All Saints offer a range of flexible course options to schools and local authorities who wish to provide CPD for adults who are engaged in supporting learning.

column1: • Extension Days developing awareness and knowledge relating to key issues in school. These days may provide one-off focus or may be linked to provide courses tailored to the needs of the attendees.

column2: Suitable for Cover Supervisors, Study Supervisors, Year Managers, other support staff and Teaching Assistants, Office Managers, School Site Managers and Admin/ Curriculum Lead Support Staff and others. These courses may be developed by the addition of Extension Days to provide customised courses.

column1: • 6-session courses addressing specific areas for development. These are based on modular accredited courses carrying 20 HE credits on successful completion. However they may also be delivered as CPD courses without accreditation. New &ndash
All modular courses are taken from the Foundation Degree for Supporting Learning programme.
